video_prompt: A powerful female figure, with long dark hair gently swaying, stands confidently. Her luminescent green eyes subtly glow and shift. She cradles a pulsating blue energy orb, its glowing trails flowing into her left hand and arm as her right hand radiates energy. Ethereal blue and purple energy wisps swirl dynamically around her. The glowing platform beneath her subtly pulses. In the background, neon city lights flicker and shift patterns across futuristic skyscrapers, enhancing the dynamic cyberpunk scene.
image_prompt: A powerful and enigmatic cyberpunk sorceress stands confidently on a glowing blue-teal platform in a futuristic neon-lit metropolis at night. She has long dark flowing hair, striking glowing emerald green eyes, sharp elegant features, and dark red lipstick. She wears a sleek, dark catsuit with luminous blue-teal circuitry patterns, a high-neck collar, armored segments, thigh cut-outs, and integrated high-heeled footwear. Her right hand radiates energy, while her left hand cradles a luminous blue orb with ethereal energy trails. The sprawling skyscrapers glow with blue, purple, and pink neon lights. Ethereal wisps and trails of purple and blue energy surround her. Dominated by cool tones of dark blue, deep purple, and electric teal, with high-contrast cinematic lighting and glowing accents. Digital art, highly detailed, epic.
refined_video_prompt: Hair gently sways. Eyes subtly glow and shift. A blue energy orb pulses, its glowing trails flowing into her left hand and arm, as her right hand radiates energy. Ethereal blue and purple energy wisps dynamically swirl around her. The platform beneath her subtly pulses. Neon city lights flicker and shift patterns across background skyscrapers.
